title: Visions of the Vampire
description:
★Born of Blood is a dark, exciting paranormal romance series starring some of your favorite supernatural baddies.★The business of vengeance brings Vampire King and leader of The Immortal Cross Clan, Vex, to the seedy southwest. Plagued by magical mental attacks and the figurative ghost of a past love, he's not only on the hunt for a killer, he's determined to fulfill a centuries old promise and hopefully save his sanity. But his plans halt at the sight of a pink haired damsel in distress and derail altogether once they speak.Elementary school teacher Leena's hopeful goal in moving to Las Vegas was simple: prove the existence of vampires once and for all. Maybe even a few other supernaturals to boot. After a steamy case of wrong place, wrong time puts her square in the sights of a drop-dead gorgeous mystery man who gives her more questions than answers, it becomes violently clear the world is nothing like she thought. 
Fall in love with the darkness in this 34k slow-burn prequel.
author: T.K. Barber
